org.webcurator.core.admin
Interface PermissionTemplateManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
PermissionTemplateManagerImpl
public interface PermissionTemplateManager

Provides the helper methods required to manage PermissionTemplates.

Author:
bprice

Method Summary
 PermissionTemplate completeTemplate(java.lang.Long templateOid, User user, java.lang.Long permissionOid)
          takes an existing template and the specified user and replaces all the variables in the template with the correct values based on the User and permissionOid
 void delete(java.lang.Long templateOid)
          deletes the specified template based on the primary key of the template
 Permission getPermission(java.lang.Long permissionOid)
          gets the Permission object based on its primary key
 PermissionTemplate getTemplate(java.lang.Long templateOid)
          gets the PermissionTemplate based on the Templates name
 java.util.List getTemplates(User user)
          gets all Permission Request Templates for the logged in user.
 java.util.List getTemplateTypes()
          gets the defined Template types within the WCT system
 void saveTemplate(PermissionTemplate permissionTemplate)
          saves the Permission Template object to the database
 

Method Detail

getTemplate

PermissionTemplate getTemplate(java.lang.Long templateOid)
gets the PermissionTemplate based on the Templates name

Parameters:
templateOid - the Primary key of the Template to load
Returns:
the PermissionTemplate

getPermission

Permission getPermission(java.lang.Long permissionOid)
gets the Permission object based on its primary key

Parameters:
permissionOid - the permission objects primary key
Returns:
the Permission object

getTemplates

java.util.List getTemplates(User user)
gets all Permission Request Templates for the logged in user. If the logged in user has a scope of ALL on the appropriate privilge, they will see all Templates in the system. If the use only has a scope of AGENCY, they will only see the Agency specific Templates.

Parameters:
user - the User to generate the Template List for
Returns:
the List of PermissionTemplate objects

saveTemplate

void saveTemplate(PermissionTemplate permissionTemplate)
saves the Permission Template object to the database

Parameters:
permissionTemplate - the permission template to persist

getTemplateTypes

java.util.List getTemplateTypes()
gets the defined Template types within the WCT system

Returns:
a List of Template types

completeTemplate

PermissionTemplate completeTemplate(java.lang.Long templateOid,
                                    User user,
                                    java.lang.Long permissionOid)
takes an existing template and the specified user and replaces all the variables in the template with the correct values based on the User and permissionOid

Parameters:
templateOid - the oid of the selected template to generate
user - the User associated with the template request
permissionOid - the permission oid that this template request is related to
Returns:
the populated PermissionTemplate with all its varaiables replaced

delete

void delete(java.lang.Long templateOid)
deletes the specified template based on the primary key of the template

Parameters:
templateOid - the template primary key to delete
